attributes.action: Compulsory Purchase of Empty / Derelict Homes
attributes.additional_details: Great Britain has over 500,000 empty or derelict homes and unused "brown fields". I think we should give all owners of these properties, 12 months to sell or rent out these properties. If they don't, they will have a compulsory purchase order (at a fair market price) from the government who in turn will sell them on. Why build on green fields when we have plenty of empty homes and industrial buildings..?
